医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示，许多抗癌药物在没有明确疗效证据的情况下获得批准新的抗癌药物正在快速上市，然后才能评估其对患者的长期有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Many-cancer-drugs-approved-without-clear-evidence-of-benefit-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Many-cancer-drugs-approved-without-clear-evidence-of-benefit-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00f5eb8f-a4e6-424c-a9f1-b36fa7b3b4e6 Tue, 15 Aug 2023 20:20:09 -0400 Many cancer drugs approved without clear evidence of benefit, study shows
瑞士首次使用质子放射治疗治疗食管肿瘤今天，一名 67 岁的食道癌患者在 Paul Scherrer Institute PSI 接受了质子（即带正电粒子）辐射的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Proton-radiotherapy-used-for-the-first-time-in-Switzerland-to-treat-esophageal-tumor.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Proton-radiotherapy-used-for-the-first-time-in-Switzerland-to-treat-esophageal-tumor.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22bb0951-9383-4cd4-9a7f-ceeb45ac4b9e Tue, 15 Aug 2023 20:05:21 -0400 Proton radiotherapy used for the first time in Switzerland to treat esophageal tumor

凯撒医疗机构承诺提供更好、更便宜的医疗服务，其全国扩张面临广泛质疑当监管机构审查 Kaiser Permanente 收购宾夕法尼亚州备受推崇的医疗系统的提议时，医疗保健专家仍然对 4 月份宣布的这项意外交易如何履行这家管理医疗巨头改善护理和降低患者费用的承诺感到困惑，其中包括它的家乡加利福尼亚州。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Promising-better-cheaper-care-Kaiser-Permanentee28099s-national-expansion-faces-wide-skepticism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Promising-better-cheaper-care-Kaiser-Permanentee28099s-national-expansion-faces-wide-skepticism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4db1884-8f16-4158-870a-7fde7f165c39 Tue, 15 Aug 2023 19:12:27 -0400 Promising better, cheaper care, Kaiser Permanente’s national expansion faces wide skepticism
